text: Jitia tai Achaia jaga ke paar kori kene jabole itcha korise, titia biswasi bhai khan pora tai laga mon dangor kori dise aru taike bhal pora grohon koribi koi kene Achaia te thaka chela khan ke ekta chithi likhi dise. Jitia tai ta te punchise, tai Isor laga anugrah pora biswasi khan ke bisi modot dise.
